long_desc.thetext:
A error happen when you get out focus from textfield. This happen in Firefox.
[Exception... "Permission denied when change properties of XULElement.selectedIndex' when calling method: [nsIAutoCompletePopup::selectedIndex]" nsresult: "0x8057001e (NS_ERROR_XPC_JS_THREW_STRING)" location: "JS frame :: http://127.0.0.1:8080/gestax/js/qooxdoo.js :: anonymous :: line 19" data: no]

Would you please post a small test program that exhibits this problem. Make the test program as tiny as possible while still exhibiting the problem.
Thanks!
Derrell

This is a XUL error and doesn't interference the text field functionality. Normally you can just ignore it.
The reason for this error seems to be related to some autocomplete implementation of the browser which gets problems when manually execute focus() or blur() on the text fields dom node.

For completeness I'd like to refer to the following Mozilla bug:
https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=236791
This bug has been around for quite some time (since Firefox 0.8?), but apparently it has been fixed now for Firefox 2. We've had not much success with workarounds (e.g. autocomplete="off" and temporary read-only). Guess, we'll have to wait for FF2 for this non-critical bug.
